description: Obstructive / mixed apnea index at 4% desaturations  [(total number of obstructive apneas associated with >= 4% desaturation+ total number of mixed apneas associated with >= 4% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculations: 60*(oarbp4 + oarop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4 + marbp4 + marop4 + manrbp4 + manrop4) / slpprdp
